entries.title_d: The Imperials are attacking some of the Dantooine station's supply fleet in retaliation for the loss of one of the freighters. Protect the supply fleet from the Imperial attack.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Protect the Supply Fleet
entries.quest_location_d: The supply fleet is located inside of the Dantooine system.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Destroy the Imperial fighters before they destroy the supply fleet.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: Travel to the supply fleet and protect them from the Imperial fighters.
entries.found_loc: I have a lock on the supply fleet. Sending you the location now.
entries.enemies_win: Well there went some very valuable ships. I really hope your Rebellion does better protecting its own interests then you did mine.
entries.enemies_arrived: I am now picking up Imperial fighters moving towards the supply fleet at attack speeds. Protect those freighters!
entries.battle_started: The Imperials are attacking my fleet! You have to protect those unarmed freighters from the TIEs.
entries.allies_win: Great work. I am going to tell those ships to get out of there before anymore Imperials show up.
entries.allies_arrived: I have a lock on some of my supply fleet. They look pretty beat up but they are intact. Get to them fast and take out any Imperials that try to destroy them.
